description: A brain for all your Halloween needs. Whether it be to fuel that spooky party or merely chew on while watching some scary movies, this undead nugget will keep you going 'till the end of time!
keywords: Brain Big Batch Jello Shot Recipe

How To Brain Big Batch Jello Shot
name: Brain Big Batch Jello Shot

recipeInstructions.name: Boil water and stir in strawberry Jell-o mix until dissolved.
recipeInstructions.text: Boil water and stir in strawberry Jell-o mix until dissolved.

recipeInstructions.name: Mix in the frozen whipped cream topping and vodka. Whisk the ingredients until properly combined. Let cool to room temperature for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.text: Mix in the frozen whipped cream topping and vodka. Whisk the ingredients until properly combined. Let cool to room temperature for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.name: Grease the brain mold, then pour in the Jell-o mixture. Put it in the fridge overnight to set.
recipeInstructions.text: Grease the brain mold, then pour in the Jell-o mixture. Put it in the fridge overnight to set.

recipeInstructions.name: To remove a Jell-O mold, put it in warm water to loosen it up and then flip it out onto a platter.
recipeInstructions.text: To remove a Jell-O mold, put it in warm water to loosen it up and then flip it out onto a platter.
